      • getTypeHash

        public Sha256Hash getTypeHash()
        GetTypeHash() GET HASH WITH DETERMINISTIC VALUE OF MASTERNODE-VIN/PARENT-HASH/VOTE-SIGNAL This hash collides with previous masternode votes when they update their votes on governance objects. With 12.1 there's various types of votes (funding, valid, delete, etc), so this is the deterministic hash that will collide with the previous vote and allow the system to update. -- We do not include an outcome, because that can change when a masternode updates their vote from yes to no on funding a specific project for example. We do not include a time because it will be updated each time the vote is updated, changing the hash
